title: Tawngtai hun hlu tawngtai hun hlu
lyrics:
Tawngtai hun hlu, tawngtai hun hlu,
Khawvel buaina ram atang hian;
Ka Pa van lalthutthleng hmaah,
Thil duh tinreng min thlensak thin.
Lungngai mangan lo thlen pawhin,
Ka thlarau chau chhawktu a ni 2
Thlemna lakah ka him fo thin
Min puih vangin tawngtai hun hlu.

Tawngtai hun hlu, tawngtai hun hlu,
Dik tak leh rinawm tak zela,
THlarau malsawmsaktu hnenah,
Ka dilnate min thlen ang che.
A hmel zawngtu, a thu ringtu,
A khawngaih changtuah min ko 2
Ka buaina zawng ka pe vek ang
Ka nghak reng che, tawngtai hun hlu.

Tawngtai hun hlu, tawngtai hun hlu,
Chatuan in nuam pana ka kal,
Pisgah tlang chhip ka thlen thlengin,
Min hnem zel rawh ka thlen hma chuan
Lei taksa hi ka kalsan ang,
Lawmman chuai ngai lo chang turin 2
Van chung sang khi ka thlen hun chuan
Tawngtai hun hlu, ka ngai tawh lo'ng.
